Hi,
I have been in discussions with FHIR guys of how the patch functionality should work. I created the following bugs after those: https://github.com/hapifhir/hapi-fhir/issues/2897, https://github.com/hapifhir/hapi-fhir/issues/2918, https://github.com/hapifhir/hapi-fhir/issues/2919.
The links to the discussions are also attached to the bugs.
Could you confirm those are the issues?
Or at least maybe you could look at the last one, since it seems to be most critical, since I couldn't find any workarounds about it. (the first two could work with workarounds to use insert and timeDateTime name).
